original_text: Then he put the lamps in their places in front of the Lord, as the Lord had commanded him.
korean_text: 또 여호와 앞에 등잔대에 불을 켜니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: Then he put the lamps in their places
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 등기를 그 자리에 두었습니다

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded him
